item.title: Radio Ninty S4E6
item.description: The longest Radio Ninty ever. Full of fun features, reviews and many long winded deviations apropo of nothing. Well worth listening to if only to hear Stuart cough, Centy moan about modern gaming and jokes about the Scottish! Apoligies for the volumes and no offence is meant to anyone at any point except Ubisoft employees. Every offence possible is meant for them.
item.itunes:author: Radio Ninty

item.title: Radio Ninty S4E1
item.description: Radio Ninty is back at long last. After a long break we are pleased to bring you a brand new show as well as a brand new website. This show centres around our belated thoughts of this years E3. Sound isn't perfect but is listenable throughout.

item.title: Radio Ninty S3E21
item.description: A great Radio Ninty for you this week dear listeners. The usual round up of news, a hands on look at the DSi and a bumper bunch of DS reviews, 4 of which score the cherished Radio Ninty 5 out of 5 score. Join Centy, Spike and Stuart for chat about GTA Chinatown Wars, Henry Hatsworth, Broken Sword Directors Cut, Rittai Picross and EA Football Academy. Get involved at www.radio-ninty.com
item.itunes:author: Radio Ninty

item.title: Radio Ninty S3E15
item.description: Weird show this one, but good. Spike, Karin and Stuart rattle on about a few of the latest gaming headlines, and not much else. Unfortunately Stuart had to leave halfway through the recording, so there are no homebrew or review sections but instead you get a solid 20 minutes of top notch chat.

item.description: It's another brand new and awesome radio Ninty. Stuart and Centy review the hot releases of the week, which are Spore PC and DS, Viva Pinata 2 on the 360 along with it's DS sibling and finally Pirates. We also bring you news of the GBATemp homebrew bounty.

item.title: Radio Ninty S3E4
item.description: Major error this week. I messed the recording up, ending up with a barely listenable take, which was such a shame as its a great show packed with gamin goodness. Spike has tried his best at making it listenable, but we realise it's still not too good or comfortable to listen too, with Centy being about 20 times louder then me. Anyway, in this show we chat about Madworld, the GBATemp Homebrew Bounty, GRID, Eternity's Child and a whole heap of other stuff. Next week we will try our best to make everything as good as we can as it will be our exciting Leipzig preview as well as our NES feature, which we held back, so you still have time to get involved in the thread.
item.itunes:author: Radio Ninty
item.itunes:subtitle: THE Nintendo Podcast - Series 3 Episode 4

item.title: Radio Ninty S3E3
item.description: One of those bonkers episodes for you to enjoy this week. An excitable Stuart, a Scottish Centy and a welcomed guest Rivaoni babble on about Geometry Wars 2, Windy x Windam, Rhythm Tengoku Gold and Korg DS. Also features the usual news and homebrew along with a look back at some Launch GC games. Apologies for the sound issues throughout, but it's worth bearing with them as it's a great show.
item.itunes:author: Radio Ninty

item.title: Radio Ninty S2E25
item.description: It's Radio Nintys first birthday party, and you're invited. Join us as we take a look back over our first year then get back on track with the latest news, a ton of homebrew news and of course Centys Etrian Odyssey 2 update. Also features a preview of Trauma Center 2 on the DS and a review of WiiWare title Pop. Due to technical issues, the last 5 minutes of the show have been lost, so sorry about the abrupt ending.
item.itunes:author: Radio Ninty

item.title: Radio Ninty S2E5
item.description: A load of DS stuff this week in a brisk and on message Radio Ninty that will not accept no for an answer. Homebrew wise we take a look at Hyena, the latest offering from Jesse Andersson along with Pocket Physics. We then take a look at some major DS releases in the shape of Professor Kageyama's Maths Training, Assassin's Creed Altair's Chronicles and the incredible Professor Layton and the Curious Village.

item.title: Radio Ninty 22
item.description: Roll up roll up for Radio Ninty is here. Show 22 features Tales of Innocence, Lanfeust of Troy, Powershot Pinball Constructor, Alvin and the chipmunks and Warhammer 40000 Squad Command and erm Call of Duty 4 on the 360.... It also features some very random chat towards the end, to make up for a sheer lack of planning by Stuart. Also, the sound quality of the opening music is poor, but the show sounds as great as ever.

item.itunes:subtitle: THE Nintendo Podcast - Episode 13
item.itunes:summary: Better late then never! Radio Ninty 13 features reviews of Fifa 08 DS, Race Driver - Create And Race, Juiced 2 and Prism Light The Way. We also take a look back at some of the greatest early DS games. Tune in next week for our feature length Zelda Special!!
item.itunes:keywords: nintendo, ds, wii, gamecube, snes, nes, gameboy, videogames, fifa 08, toca race and create, primsm, juiced 2

item.title: Radio Ninty 12
item.description: Radio Ninty 12 is here! Featuring the full review of the Wii's Super Paper Mario along with Tingle and Mysims, both for the DS. Of course there's a round up of the weeks news, and this week we have a special guest! One of our forum members, Rivaoni, joins us for a look at some of the great Sega games made for Nintendo consoles. Don't forget to get involved on the forum at www.radio-ninty.com.
item.itunes:author: Radio Ninty
item.itunes:subtitle: THE Nintendo Podcast - Episode 12

item.title: Radio Ninty 11
item.description: The 11th Radio Ninty is here! Join Stuart and Centy for reviews of Need For Speed Carbon, Drawn To Life and Jam Sessions. Also featured is a round up of the latest news and a preview of the amazing Super Paper Mario. This weeks show was only possible thanks to Anadin Ultra Ibuprofen.
item.itunes:author: Radio Ninty

item.title: Radio Ninty 10
item.description: On this weeks sublime Radio Ninty Stuart and Centy discuss Zelda Four Swords and the best 5 DS homebrew games and apps. We also have an exclusive interview with Two Tribes, the developers of the brilliant Worms Open Warfare 2 for the DS. So sit back and enjoy another great show!
item.itunes:author: Radio Ninty

item.title: Radio Ninty 9
item.description: After last weeks Leipzig special, this week we have games. Games, games and some more games. Reviews of Tiger Woods DS 08, Kirby's Airride, One Piece DS, Ecolis and the amazing Worms Open Warfare 2 on the DS all feature along with a brief round up of the weeks news.
item.itunes:author: Radio Ninty
item.itunes:subtitle: THE Nintendo Podcast - Episode 9

item.title: Radio Ninty 8
item.description: The best Radio Ninty yet! Join us as Stu rambles on and on about his experience at this years Leipzig GDC with hands on impressions of Wii Fit, Super Mario Galaxy and Metroid Prime 3, along with the usual round up of news and reviews. There's a little bit of background noise which we apoligise for and this is a bit of a long show, but that's a one off!
item.itunes:author: Radio Ninty

item.title: Radio Ninty 7
item.description: This weeks show features reviews of the long awaited Luminous Arc, Kirby's Dream Course, Dragon Ball Z Budokai 2 and SSX Blur. We also have a round up of all the latest site news and a look forward to next weeks Leipzig GDC coverage. Check the forum for an additional download and links mentioned in the show.

item.title: Radio Ninty 6
item.description: Join us on Radio Ninty 6 as we discuss Chibi Robo on the Cube, Excite Truck for the Wii along with Donkey Kong Jungle Climber and Kikansha Thomas Kokugo Sansuu Eigo for the DS. We also dissect this weeks news, in place of a feature which will now be on next weeks show. So sit back and enjoy another jam packed Radio Ninty!

item.title: Radio Ninty 4
item.description: On Radio Ninty 4 we have an exclusive interview with Jens Andersson, the creator of Colors DS. We also have some chat about Taiko no Tatsujin DS, Tony Hawks Underground 2, Jump Ultimate Stars and Onimusha Tactics. Sit back and enjoy.

item.title: Radio Ninty 3
item.description: The third Radio Ninty is here! This week we talk about Battle Stadium D.O.N, Hoshigami, Big Brain Academy for Wii and DDR Mario. And we have a great feature discussion about "Nintendo and You". This week Stuart is a bit quiet, well, it's a change from Centy being quiet!

item.title: Radio Ninty Episode 2
item.description: The second episode of Radio Ninty is here. Join us as we review DK : Jungle Beat, Tales of the Tempest, Sonic Rush and a few others. Also included this week is an indepth round up of E3, with news about Nintendos showings and our personal picks from the show floor.

item.title: Radio Ninty 1
item.description: Join us for the debut Radio Ninty show. Stuart and Centy talk about the games that they've been playing this week and take a look at what to expect at this years forthcoming E3. Please note that Centy had technical problems so is a bit quiet, but this will be fixed in future episodes.
item.itunes:author: Radio Ninty
